verses.verse: <S%H2896>Better<s%> is a <S%H7326>poor<s%> man who <S%H1980>walks<s%> in his <S%H8537>integrity<s%> <S%H4480>Than<s%> he <S%H6141>who<s%> is <S%H6141>perverse<s%> in <S%H8193>speech<s%> and is a <S%H3684>fool.<s%>

<S%H1571>Also<s%> it is not <S%H2896>good<s%> for a <S%H5315>person<s%> to be <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> And he who <S%H213>makes<s%> <S%H213>haste<s%> with his <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H2398>errs.<s%>
The <S%H200>foolishness<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H5557>subverts<s%> his <S%H1870>way,<s%> And his <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H2196>rages<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
<S%H1952>Wealth<s%> <S%H3254>adds<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H7453>friends,<s%> But a <S%H1800>poor<s%> <S%H1800>man<s%> is <S%H6504>separated<s%> from his <S%H7453>friend.<s%>
A <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> will not <S%H5352>go<s%> <S%H5352>unpunished,<s%> And he who <S%H6315>tells<s%> <S%H3577>lies<s%> will not <S%H4422>escape.<s%>

<S%H7227>Many<s%> will <S%H9134>entreat<s%> the <S%H6440>favor<s%> of a <S%H5081>generous<s%> <S%H5081>man,<s%> And <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3605>man<s%> is a <S%H7453>friend<s%> to him who gives <S%H4976>gifts.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H251>brothers<s%> of a <S%H7326>poor<s%> <S%H7326>man<s%> <S%H8130>hate<s%> him; <S%H637>How<s%> <S%H637>much<s%> <S%H3588><s%> <S%H637>more<s%> do his <S%H4828>friends<s%> <S%H7368>go<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from him! He <S%H7291>pursues<s%> [them with] <S%H561>words,<s%> [but] they are <S%H3808>gone.<s%>
He who <S%H7069>gets<s%> <S%H3820>wisdom<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%> his own <S%H5315>soul;<s%> He who <S%H8104>keeps<s%> <S%H8394>understanding<s%> will <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H9185>good.<s%>
A <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> will not <S%H5352>go<s%> <S%H5352>unpunished,<s%> And he who <S%H6315>tells<s%> <S%H3577>lies<s%> will perish.
<S%H8588>Luxury<s%> is not <S%H5000>fitting<s%> for a <S%H3684>fool;<s%> <S%H637>Much<s%> <S%H3588><s%> <S%H637>less<s%> for a <S%H5650>slave<s%> to <S%H4910>rule<s%> over <S%H8269>princes.<s%>
A man's <S%H7922>discretion<s%> <S%H748>makes<s%> him <S%H748>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger,<s%> And it is his <S%H8597>glory<s%> to <S%H5674>overlook<s%> a <S%H6588>transgression.<s%>
The king's <S%H2197>wrath<s%> is like the <S%H5099>roaring<s%> of a <S%H3715>lion,<s%> But his <S%H7522>favor<s%> is like <S%H2919>dew<s%> on the <S%H6212>grass.<s%>
A <S%H3684>foolish<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> is <S%H1942>destruction<s%> to his father, And the <S%H1>contentions<s%> of a <S%H4066>wife<s%> are a <S%H802>constant<s%> <S%H2956>dripping.<s%>
<S%H1004>House<s%> and <S%H1952>wealth<s%> are an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> from fathers, But a <S%H1>prudent<s%> <S%H7919>wife<s%> is from the <S%H802>Lord.<s%>
<S%H6103>Laziness<s%> <S%H5307>casts<s%> into a <S%H8639>deep<s%> <S%H8639>sleep,<s%> And an <S%H9559>idle<s%> <S%H5315>man<s%> will <S%H7456>suffer<s%> <S%H7456>hunger.<s%>
He who <S%H8104>keeps<s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> <S%H8104>keeps<s%> his <S%H5315>soul,<s%> [But] he who is <S%H959>careless<s%> of his <S%H1870>ways<s%> will <S%H4191>die.<s%>
He who is <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to a <S%H1800>poor<s%> <S%H1800>man<s%> <S%H9233>lends<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And He will <S%H9608>repay<s%> him for his <S%H1576>good<s%> <S%H1576>deed.<s%>
<S%H3256>Discipline<s%> your <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3588>while<s%> <S%H3426>there<s%> is <S%H8615>hope,<s%> And do not <S%H5375>desire<s%> <S%H5315><s%> his <S%H4191>death.<s%>

[A man of] <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2534>anger<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H6066>penalty,<s%> For <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H5337>rescue<s%> [him,] you will only have to <S%H3254>do<s%> it <S%H3254>again.<s%>
<S%H8085>Listen<s%> to <S%H6098>counsel<s%> and <S%H6901>accept<s%> <S%H4148>discipline,<s%> That you may be <S%H2449>wise<s%> the <S%H319>rest<s%> of your days.
<S%H7227>Many<s%> are the <S%H4284>plans<s%> in a man's <S%H3820>heart,<s%> But the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> it will <S%H6965>stand.<s%>

<S%H8378>What<s%> is <S%H8378>desirable<s%> in a <S%H120>man<s%> is his <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> And [it is] <S%H2896>better<s%> to be a <S%H7326>poor<s%> man <S%H4480>than<s%> a <S%H376>liar.<s%> <S%H3577><s%>
The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> [leads] to <S%H9132>life,<s%> So that one may <S%H3885>sleep<s%> <S%H7649>satisfied,<s%> <S%H1077>untouched<s%> <S%H6485><s%> by <S%H9563>evil.<s%>
The <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> <S%H2934>buries<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> in the <S%H6747>dish,<s%> [And] will not <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H7725>bring<s%> it <S%H7725>back<s%> to his <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

<S%H5221>Strike<s%> a <S%H9238>scoffer<s%> and the <S%H6612>naive<s%> may <S%H6191>become<s%> <S%H6191>shrewd,<s%> But <S%H3198>reprove<s%> one who <S%H995>has<s%> <S%H995>understanding<s%> and he will <S%H995>gain<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%>
He who <S%H7703>assaults<s%> [his] father [and] <S%H1>drives<s%> [his] <S%H1272>mother<s%> <S%H517>away<s%> Is a <S%H1272>shameful<s%> and <S%H954>disgraceful<s%> <S%H2659>son.<s%>
<S%H2308>Cease<s%> <S%H8085>listening,<s%> my <S%H1121>son,<s%> to <S%H4148>discipline,<s%> [And you will] <S%H7686>stray<s%> from the <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%>

A <S%H1100>rascally<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> <S%H9238>makes<s%> a <S%H9238>mockery<s%> of <S%H4941>justice,<s%> And the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1104>spreads<s%> <S%H205>iniquity.<s%>
<S%H8201>Judgments<s%> are <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for <S%H9238>scoffers,<s%> And <S%H4112>blows<s%> for the <S%H1460>back<s%> of <S%H3684>fools.<s%>
